userInterfaces

Class AbstractDialogIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • userInterfaces.AbstractDialogIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputOutputInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogIO

    public abstract class AbstractDialogIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements InputOutputInterface
    A partially implemented class with the input and output methods to read a String, read an int, output a message, and display a list of choices from which the user must select the index of a choice. The input and output is done via dialog boxes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractDialogIO() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int readChoice(java.lang.String[] options)
      Display the list of options and read an int that is the index of one of the options.

        outputString, readInt, readString

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDialogIO

        public AbstractDialogIO()

    • Method Detail

      • readChoice

        public int readChoice(java.lang.String[] options)
        Display the list of options and read an int that is the index of one of the options. The first option is the default.
        Specified by:
        readChoice in interface InputOutputInterface
        Parameters:
        options - an array with the options that are presented to the user
        Returns:
        the int specifying the array index for the option selected by the user
